updates.title: Figma's acquisition of AI-powered media generation company Weavy signals major expansion into AI-generated content creation, with plans to integrate the technology across the entire Figma platform in coming months.

Nvidia's reported $1 billion investment in AI coding platform Poolside, following their record $5 trillion market cap milestone, indicates massive enterprise AI development tools expansion expected in Q4 2025.

ElevenLabs CEO's prediction that AI audio models will become 'commoditized' suggests a wave of more affordable voice synthesis tools entering the market, potentially disrupting the current premium pricing model for creative professionals.

Tim Cook's announcement that Apple Intelligence will integrate with more third-party AI tools indicates November-December rollout of expanded AI partnerships, potentially opening new opportunities for design and creative AI platforms.

Character.AI's decision to end chatbot experiences for minors following safety concerns signals broader industry shift toward stricter AI safety measures that may impact creative AI tools targeting younger demographics in November.
